title: Using Google Cloud’s Dataproc with Datastax Astra DB to perform Machine Learning
description:
A walkthrough of the steps needed to setup a Dataproc cluster with AstraDB.  Jupyter notebooks are provided with different Machine Learning techniques

CONNECT WITH DATASTAX
Subscribe: http://www.youtube.com/c/datastaxdevs?sub_confirmation=1 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/datastaxdevs
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/datastaxdevs

ABOUT DATASTAX DEVELOPERS
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev to watch our free online courses, tutorials, and more.

transcript.text: hello everybody welcome to today's session today i'm going to take you through um connecting google cloud platform dataproc with datastax astra i'm going to be using some jupiter is the version we're going to be using and we're going to be connecting that to data stacks astra and the release that we're using of data stacks astra is based off of today's date which is august 17th 2020. and then the dataproc instance is going to have some jupiter notebooks that are associated with it that are based off of some previous data stacks sessions that we've done with a little bit of machine learning so be able to follow along with those as well um just a disclaimer before we move forward this isn't uh an official datastax guidance it's simply a knowledge share that i've put
